subject: The Skinny: Friday May 4, 2007
body:

  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 





Who's In Hillary Clinton's Fave 16?
They call themselves online political operatives, or "OPOs," and they're playing a bigger role than 
      ever in the presidential camapigns. 
Plus, a look at Hillary Clinton's Fave 16. 
And the morning papers weigh 
      in on last night's GOP presidential debate.
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...

Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
